name: Tacky Stacky
description:
Stack the stones as high as you can - that's it!

With the stones getting weirder in shape and less likely to stay together use all your balancing skills to keep your tower standing...think Tower of Pisa meets Jenga in this deceptively tricky game of skill.

NOTE: For Linux and Mac users, we haven't forgotten about you and will try to get this game playable for you in the post jam.

This is my submission for the June 2019 #extragamejam that went on from the 30th of may to the 5th of June. The theme was a ‘Connect’.

The game has 3 different difficulty levels and a free build mode, you can also take a screenshot of your finished tower in game if you managed to reach the top!

Controls:

Drop Object: Space Bar

Rotate Object: Right mouse button and drag

Change Drop Off Height: Scroll wheel

Move Camera: Left Mouse Button and Drag

Scroll Camera and Ground Height: Left Mouse Button and Scroll Wheel

Save Current State: Tab --- Reload Saved State: R

The time spent was around 20 Hours and 30 mins over 4 days. Don’t forget to check out the other entries for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 and give them some feedback (...and mine to if your up for it)!

To see more of my work, and updates on the development of other my future jam entries, check out these links;
